amendment.description: An amendment to allow the Regional Forester to exempt projects involving the removal of trees from the applicability of the citizen suit authority contained in the Endangered Species Act on the basis that a wildfire is likely to cause harm to the forest ecosystem and destroy human life and dwellings.

action.text: Mr. Miller, George raised a point of order against the Shadegg amendment (A012). Mr. Miller stated that the amendment constituted legislation in an appropriations bill. The Chair sustained the point of order.
